scripts.network:dev2: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @neighbourhoods/nh-launcher-applet && dotenv -- concurrently "open-cli http://localhost:${UI_PORT} && open-cli http://localhost:${UI_PORT_2} && cd ui/app && npm run dev2" "dotenv -- npm run start:dev2"
scripts.start:dev2: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT,$VITE_ADMIN_PORT_2 generate ./workdir/we.happ -n 2 --run=$VITE_HC_PORT,$VITE_HC_PORT_2 -a we network mem
scripts.dev:happs: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$HOLO_ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/we.happ --run $HOLO_AGENT_PORT -a we network mem
scripts.package: npm run package:webapp && npm run build:happ && npm run build:nh-launcher-applet && npm run build:launcher && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build: npm run build:webapp && npm run build:happ && npm run build:nh-launcher-applet && npm run build:launcher
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/we/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/lobby/workdir
